[GAME] Welcome to the Chess Arena! You are commanding the White pieces in this strategic battle.
Your mission is to checkmate your opponent's king through tactical superiority.
Execute your strategic moves using UCI notation within square brackets.

rounds.response: [g1f3] - Developing the king's knight to f3, bolstering control of the central squares (d4, e5) and preparing for kingside castling while maintaining flexibility for the position. This aggressive development pressures Black's potential knight deployment and supports the strong pawn duo on e4/d4.
